Description: DescriptionVestige Folic & Iron Plus CapsulesOne of the most common nutrient deficiencies found in women is that of iron and folic acid. Deficiency of both causes anaemia which results in a decreased number of red blood cells (RBCs) or low hemoglobin levels in the blood. The goal of providing iron-folic acid supplements is to restore normal levels of iron and to replenish hemoglobin levels in the blood. Poor dietary intake of iron accelerated increase in requirements of iron e.g. during pregnancy and lactation; adolescent females and elderly can benefit from the supplementation of iron and folic acid.Vestige Folic & Iron IngredientsEach capsule contains Ferrous Fumarate 250 mg Folic Acid 1 mg Vitamin C (coated) 75 mg Vitamin B12 15 mcg Zinc Sulphate Heptahydrate 100 mg equivalent to elemental zinc 22.7 mg.Vestige Iron & Folic Capsule Benefits /Vestige Iron & Folic Ke Fayde IRON: An important mineral that the body needs to produce red blood cells (RBCs) and in turn improves hemoglobin levels.FOLIC ACID: Needed to form healthy cells especially RBCs. Name: Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth
Description: DescriptionVestige Kidney Health / Ayusante Kidney Health / Kidney Health Supplements/ Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth One in every 10 adults in India suffers from chronic kidney disease (CKD) and at any given point nearly five lakh patients are in need of life-long dialysis or transplant according to Sanjay K. Agarwal Professor and Head of Nephrology AIIMS.Kidney :The National Kidney Foundation of India estimates that 100 people in a million suffer from kidney ailments in India.The kidneys are bean-shaped organs that serve several essential regulatory roles.The kidneys are a pair of organs located in the back of the abdomen.Each kidney is about 4 or 5 inches long & about the size of a fist.There are two kidneys each about the size of a fist located on either side of the spine at the lowest level of the rib cage.Each kidney contains up to a million functioning units called nephrons.Importance of Kidney:Â The kidneys are powerful chemical factories that perform the followingÂ functions.Â Kidneys filter extra water and wastes out of your blood and produce urine.Remove waste products from the body.Balance the fluids in the body.Release the hormones that regulate blood pressure.Produce an active form of Vitamin D that promotes strong and healthy bones.Causes of Kidney Disease:Â Anyone can develop kidney disease regardless of their age. The main risk factors for developing kidney diseases are: Diabetes.High blood pressure.Cardiovascular (heart and blood vessel) disease.A family history of kidney failure or Renal Failure.Common Symptoms of Kidney Disease: Changes in urination â€”More or less urination than usual changes in the color of urine foamy or bubbly urineSwelling of the feet ankles hands or face â€” Fluid the kidneys canâ€™t remove stays in the tissues.Fatigue or weakness â€” due to the build-up of wastes.Shortness of breath â€”Because the excess fluid can build up in the lungs.Itching â€” waste build-up in the body can cause severe itching especially in the legs Loss of appetite.Nausea and vomiting.Common kidney problems include:Â

Name: Vestige Spirulina Capsules
Description: DescriptionVestige Spirulina Capsules Vestige Spirulina is a natural algae powder that is high in protein and a good source of antioxidants B-vitamins Vitamins A C D E and minerals. Description: DescriptionVestige Ayusante Vital Complex / Ayusante Vital ComplexDo you know what is oxidative stress ?Oxidative stressÂ is an imbalance between the production of free radicals and the ability of the body to counteract or detoxify their harmful effects through neutralization by antioxidants.Â When there are more free radicals present than can be kept in balance by antioxidants the free radicals can start doing damage to bodyÂ proteinsÂ fatty tissueÂ &Â DNAÂ structure ofÂ your body. It is one of the major risk factors for a number of chronic diseases including diabetes cardiovascular diseases and cancer.Why Obesity is Dangerous / Facts About ObesityWorldwide obesity has nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.overweight is a BMI greater than or equal to 25obesity is a BMI greater than or equal to 30.In 2016 more than 1.9 billion adults aged 18 years and older were overweight. Of these over 650 million adults were obese.In 2016 39% of adults aged 18 years and over (39% of men and 40% of women) were overweight.Overall about 13% of the worldâ€™s adult population (11% of men and 15% of women) were obese in 2016.The worldwide prevalence of obesity nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.41 million children under the age of 5 were overweight or obese in 2016.Worldwide at least 2.8 million people die each year as a result of being overweight or obese.THE GOOD NEWS: Obesity is preventable.What causes obesity and overweight?The basic cause of obesity and overweight is an energy imbalance between calorie intake and calories used.An increased intake of high calories food and a fatty diet.An increase in physical inactivity due to the increasingly sedentary nature of the lifestyle and nature of work.Factors affecting fitnessPhysical fitness is considered a measure of the bodyâ€™s ability to function efficiently in work and leisure activities Factors affecting fitness:DietExercisePhysical disabilityIllness and fatigueIntake of DrugsStressEnvironmentLifestyleCommon health consequences of overweight and obesity?Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:Cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke) which were the leading cause of death in 2012Â Diabetes;Musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis â€“ a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);Some cancers (including endometrial breast ovarian prostate liver gallbladder kidney and colon).What is the importance of weight management?Losing weight as part of weight management is important because weighing too much is not good for healthBeing overweight increases your risk of health conditions such as heart problems high blood pressure type 2 diabetes osteoarthritis sleep problems respiratory (breathing) problems and many othersThe best way to lose weight is to eat fewer calories (units of energy that your body gets from food) and get regular exerciseLosing even a small amount of weight can lower your risk of health problemsHow can overweight and obesity be reduced?At the individual level people can:Reduce high calories diet intake from total fats and sugars.Use fresh fruit and vegetables as well as legumes whole grains and nuts.Regular physical activity (60 minutes a day for children and 150 minutes spread through the week for adults).How to reduce weight â€“ TipsDrink 3-4 litres of water daily.Eat less amount of refined carbohydrates like white bread pasta etc.Go for smaller portions of meals.Keep It is one of the major risk factors for a number of chronic diseases including diabetes cardiovascular diseases and cancer.Why Obesity is Dangerous / Facts About ObesityWorldwide obesity has nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.overweight is a BMI greater than or equal to 25obesity is a BMI greater than or equal to 30.In 2016 more than 1.9 billion adults aged 18 years and older were overweight. Of these over 650 million adults were obese.In 2016 39% of adults aged 18 years and over (39% of men and 40% of women) were overweight.Overall about 13% of the worldâ€™s adult population (11% of men and 15% of women) were obese in 2016.The worldwide prevalence of obesity nearly tripled between 1975 and 2016.41 million children under the age of 5 were overweight or obese in 2016.Worldwide at least 2.8 million people die each year as a result of being overweight or obese.THE GOOD NEWS: Obesity is preventable.What causes obesity and overweight?The basic cause of obesity and overweight is an energy imbalance between calorie intake and calories used.An increased intake of high calories food and a fatty diet.An increase in physical inactivity due to the increasingly sedentary nature of the lifestyle and nature of work.Factors affecting fitnessPhysical fitness is considered a measure of the bodyâ€™s ability to function efficiently in work and leisure activities Factors affecting fitness:DietExercisePhysical disabilityIllness and fatigueIntake of DrugsStressEnvironmentLifestyleCommon health consequences of overweight and obesity?Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:Cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke) which were the leading cause of death in 2012Â Diabetes;Musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis â€“ a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);Some cancers (including endometrial breast ovarian prostate liver gallbladder kidney and colon).What is the importance of weight management?Losing weight as part of weight management is important because weighing too much is not good for healthBeing overweight increases your risk of health conditions such as heart problems high blood pressure type 2 diabetes osteoarthritis sleep problems respiratory (breathing) problems and many othersThe best way to lose weight is to eat fewer calories (units of energy that your body gets from food) and get regular exerciseLosing even a small amount of weight can lower your risk of health problemsHow can overweight and obesity be reduced?At the individual level people can:Reduce high calories diet intake from total fats and sugars.Use fresh fruit and vegetables as well as legumes whole grains and nuts.Regular physical activity (60 minutes a day for children and 150 minutes spread through the week for adults).How to reduce weight â€“ TipsDrink 3-4 litres of water daily.Eat less amount of refined carbohydrates like white bread pasta etc.Go for smaller portions of meals.Keep healthy food around in case you are hungry.Eat more of fibre-rich foods.Chew food slowly and properly.Avoid processed foods.#Veslim #VeslimShakeÂ  #VeslimShakeBenefits #VeslimShakePrice #VeslimShakeReviews #WeightLoss #WeightManagement #Obesity #Fitness #Diet #Vestproduct #Vestige

Description: DescriptionVestige Prime Krill OilWhat is Vestige Krill Oil?Krill Oil Detail: Krill OilÂ supplement that is rapidly gaining popularity as an alternative to fish oil. Krill oil is mostly available in soft gel capsule form and not available in a form for Krill oil Tablets. Krill oil is oil from a tiny shrimplike fish. Krill from the Antarctic is also called Euphausia Superba. They are found in the colder waters of the ocean. Krill is found in the oceans off of Antarctica Canada and Japan. Krill primarily serve as a food source for other animals in the ocean like whales seals penguins squid and fish.Krill Oil Vs Fish oil:Â Krill oil is better than fish oil.Â Krill oil is a supplement that contains the omega-3 fatty acids EPA and DHA. The chemical structure of its fatty acids and red color set it apart from fish oil.Source of Krill Oil:Â Antarctic Krill which is the source of Krill Oil. The Southern Ocean constitutes one of the most remote areas on our planet and as such is it isolated from many environmental contaminants.Â Antarctic krill feeds on plankton close to the bottom of the food chain and is therefore free of any accumulation of contaminants such as heavy metals that are typically found in many fishes.Krill Oil CapsulesÂ ContentsKrill oil is a rich source of phospholipids and phospholipid-bound omega fatty acids.Vestige Krill oil capsules are a rich source of Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids: EPA (Eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid).Unlike fish oil the omega-3 fatty acids in Krill oil are absorbed and carried to the bodyâ€™s cells in phospholipid form that reaches and gets assimilated in all major organs.Krill oil also contains a powerful natural antioxidant â€“ Astaxanthin.Â Vestige Prime Krill Oil Extraction processVestige Prime Krill Oil contains K-Real Krill oil manufactured by a propriety process calledÂ Multi-Stage Oil extraction (MSOÂ®)This process preserves the natural nutrient profile of Krill Oil while removing spoilage components such as â€“ Trimethylamine (TMA) â€“ Total Volatile Nitrogen (TVN) â€“ Other oxidative derivatives.It leads to improves physical properties and odor â€“ Less fishy odor â€“ Optimal viscosity and stability â€“ No fishy burps.Â Krill oilâ€™s best brandÂ isÂ Vestige Krill oil.Antarctic Krill (Euphausia Superba):Â Antarctic Krill are swimming crustaceans that live in the Antarctic waters of the Southern Ocean.Krill Oil Benefits/ Krill Oil Usage / Vestige Prime Krill Oil Benefits / Krill oil ke faydeKrill Oil is a phospholipid-bound omega-3 product that is better absorbed into the blood and target organs such as the brain heart liver etc.Krill oil is an excellent source of healthy fats. The omega-3 fats in krill oil may be easier to absorb than those in fish oil but more studies are needed to say for sure.Krill Oil Capsules supports cardiovascular health &Â It helps to sustain healthy cholesterol levels.Studies have found that krill oil supplement like other sources of omega-3 fats may be effective at improving blood lipid levels and other risk factors for heart disease.Omega 3 in Krill Oil helps to prevent blood clots that can causes strokes and heart attacks (CAD).Krill oil helps to improve joint lubrication and overall joint function. Several animal and human studies have found that taking krill oil supplements helps improve joint pain and arthritis symptoms though more studies are needed.Krill Oil helps to improve mental concentration alertness memory and mental focus.Krill oil benefits to the skin It gives a radiant complexion and increased moisture levels in the skin.Astaxanthin in Krill oil is a potent antioxidant that protects the body against free radical damage.Consumption of krill oil was shown to have benefits to human health including heart health anti-inflammation liver benefits muscle benefits vascular benefits and joint benefits.Several studies have found that Krill Oil Omega-3 fats may help improve period pain and PMS. Description: DescriptionVestige Coenzyme Q10Coenzyme Q10 is an essential chemical that the body produces naturally. A deficiency of this chemical can have adverseÂ effects andÂ coenzymeÂ Q10 supplements may offer health benefits.Â Co-enzyme Q10 research has yielded a Nobel Prize in biochemistry in 1978 when the British scientist Peter Mitchell mapped out exactly how the nutrient works inside the cell.Â Â It is a powerful antioxidant that protects your cells from molecules that may cause damage. Your CoQ10 levels can drop due to age stress and cholesterol-lowering statin drug therapy and taking a CoQ10 supplement can help replenish your Coq10 back to optimal levels.Vestige Coenzyme Q10 benefits / Co-Enzyme Q 10 ke fayde / Co-Enzyme Q 10 UsesCoq10 might improve exercise tolerance in angina.Co-Enzyme Q 10 decreasing the risk of heart problems in people who have had a recent myocardial infarction.Co-Enzyme Q10 is good for blood vessel complications caused by coronary bypass surgery.Co-Enzyme Q 10 is good for Hypertension management Combining Coq10 with other antihypertensive agents may permit a decrease of antihypertensive dose as it can enhance the effects of antihypertensive medications.Taking Coq10 orally may lower systolic blood pressure by about 25% after 10-weeks of therapy in some people.The Role of Coq10 in Female Fertility:Â Â As women age their ability to get pregnant decreases because of poor egg formation and egg quality also drops with age.Â CoQ10 levels decline to start at age 21 and can drop with agingÂ women may need to supplement withÂ Coenzyme q10 support fertility.Â CoQ10 plays a vital role in the production of the energy required by egg cells and may support their normal functions.The Role of Coq10 in Male Fertility:Â Coq10 treatment can improve the movement and density of sperm in men with certain types of infertility.Â Stress sun exposure and smoking can cause your body to make molecules called reactive oxygen species (ROS). While the term ROS may be unfamiliar to you you have likely heard people talking about â€œfree radical damageâ€.Â Antioxidants can help protect your cells from ROS damage and taking antioxidants has been associated with increased sperm cell count and motility.Â Coq10 is a powerful antioxidant that can help neutralize excess ROS.Â Therefore Vestige Coenzyme q 10 may be necessary to support a healthy sex life.Improving the immune system of people with HIVÂ / AIDS: Coq10 is being used for strengthening the immune system of people with HIV / AIDS.Â Â Preventing migraine headaches (prophylaxis): Oral Vestige Coenzyme q10 capsules helps in preventing migraine headaches. It can decrease the frequency of headaches by about 36 %. However Coq10 does not seem to be effective in treating migraine once it has developed.Lower levels of Coq10 have been observed in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. Increasing Coq10 may increase the level of dopamine which is thought to be lower in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. It has also been suggested that CoQ10 might protect brain cells from damage by free radicals.Statins-induced myopathy Statins sometimes cause muscle pain. Oral CoQ10 might reduce this pain.It increases a healthy life span its lower dose of reducing oxidation and DNA double-strand breaks and a combination of a diet rich in polyunsaturated fatty acids and Vestige Coenzyme q10 supplementation leads to a longer life span in rats.Muscular dystrophy: Oral Co Enzyme q10 seems to improve physical performance in this inherited disorder.Cancer: Coq10 is being investigated as a treatment for cancer and as a relief from cancer treatment side-effect.Â Â Â CoQ10 plays a critical role in the protection of cell DNA and cell survival both of which are strongly linked to cancer prevention and recurrence.CoQ10 can reduce oxidative damage and inflammation that results in diseases of the lungs.CoQ10 has been shown to protect brain cells from oxidative damage and reduce the action of harmful compounds that can lead to brain disease.CoQ10 canÂ increase insulin sensitivity and improve blood sugar levels.When applied directly to the skin CoQ10 can reduce sun damage and increase antioxidant protection. Name: Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth
Description: DescriptionVestige Kidney Health / Ayusante Kidney Health / Kidney Health Supplements/ Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth One in every 10 adults in India suffers from chronic kidney disease (CKD) and at any given point nearly five lakh patients are in need of life-long dialysis or transplant according to Sanjay K. Agarwal Professor and Head of Nephrology AIIMS.Kidney :The National Kidney Foundation of India estimates that 100 people in a million suffer from kidney ailments in India.The kidneys are bean-shaped organs that serve several essential regulatory roles.The kidneys are a pair of organs located in the back of the abdomen.Each kidney is about 4 or 5 inches long & about the size of a fist.There are two kidneys each about the size of a fist located on either side of the spine at the lowest level of the rib cage.Each kidney contains up to a million functioning units called nephrons.Importance of Kidney:Â The kidneys are powerful chemical factories that perform the followingÂ functions.Â Kidneys filter extra water and wastes out of your blood and produce urine.Remove waste products from the body.Balance the fluids in the body.Release the hormones that regulate blood pressure.Produce an active form of Vitamin D that promotes strong and healthy bones.Causes of Kidney Disease:Â Anyone can develop kidney disease regardless of their age. The main risk factors for developing kidney diseases are: Diabetes.High blood pressure.Cardiovascular (heart and blood vessel) disease.A family history of kidney failure or Renal Failure.Common Symptoms of Kidney Disease: Changes in urination â€”More or less urination than usual changes in the color of urine foamy or bubbly urineSwelling of the feet ankles hands or face â€” Fluid the kidneys canâ€™t remove stays in the tissues.Fatigue or weakness â€” due to the build-up of wastes.Shortness of breath â€”Because the excess fluid can build up in the lungs.Itching â€” waste build-up in the body can cause severe itching especially in the legs Loss of appetite.Nausea and vomiting.Common kidney problems include:Â

Krill primarily serve as a food source for other animals in the ocean like whales seals penguins squid and fish.Krill Oil Vs Fish oil:Â Krill oil is better than fish oil.Â Krill oil is a supplement that contains the omega-3 fatty acids EPA and DHA. The chemical structure of its fatty acids and red color set it apart from fish oil.Source of Krill Oil:Â Antarctic Krill which is the source of Krill Oil. The Southern Ocean constitutes one of the most remote areas on our planet and as such is it isolated from many environmental contaminants.Â Antarctic krill feeds on plankton close to the bottom of the food chain and is therefore free of any accumulation of contaminants such as heavy metals that are typically found in many fishes.Krill Oil CapsulesÂ ContentsKrill oil is a rich source of phospholipids and phospholipid-bound omega fatty acids.Vestige Krill oil capsules are a rich source of Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids: EPA (Eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid).Unlike fish oil the omega-3 fatty acids in Krill oil are absorbed and carried to the bodyâ€™s cells in phospholipid form that reaches and gets assimilated in all major organs.Krill oil also contains a powerful natural antioxidant â€“ Astaxanthin.Â Vestige Prime Krill Oil Extraction processVestige Prime Krill Oil contains K-Real Krill oil manufactured by a propriety process calledÂ Multi-Stage Oil extraction (MSOÂ®)This process preserves the natural nutrient profile of Krill Oil while removing spoilage components such as â€“ Trimethylamine (TMA) â€“ Total Volatile Nitrogen (TVN) â€“ Other oxidative derivatives.It leads to improves physical properties and odor â€“ Less fishy odor â€“ Optimal viscosity and stability â€“ No fishy burps.Â Krill oilâ€™s best brandÂ isÂ Vestige Krill oil.Antarctic Krill (Euphausia Superba):Â Antarctic Krill are swimming crustaceans that live in the Antarctic waters of the Southern Ocean.Krill Oil Benefits/ Krill Oil Usage / Vestige Prime Krill Oil Benefits / Krill oil ke faydeKrill Oil is a phospholipid-bound omega-3 product that is better absorbed into the blood and target organs such as the brain heart liver etc.Krill oil is an excellent source of healthy fats. Several animal and human studies have found that taking krill oil supplements helps improve joint pain and arthritis symptoms though more studies are needed.Krill Oil helps to improve mental concentration alertness memory and mental focus.Krill oil benefits to the skin It gives a radiant complexion and increased moisture levels in the skin.Astaxanthin in Krill oil is a potent antioxidant that protects the body against free radical damage.Consumption of krill oil was shown to have benefits to human health including heart health anti-inflammation liver benefits muscle benefits vascular benefits and joint benefits.Several studies have found that Krill Oil Omega-3 fats may help improve period pain and PMS. Only a few studies have specifically investigated the effects of krill oil on inflammation but they have all found beneficial effects.Often called â€œthe king of the carotenoidsâ€ astaxanthin is 10 to 100 times more powerful than other carotenoids like beta-carotene and lycopene found in vegetarian sources like carrots tomato etc.Astaxanthin has powerful UV-blocking properties and protects from sun-related damage.It has shown to help improve skin moisture levels elasticity and smoothness and in reducing wrinkles.It also supports heart health.Benefits of Krill Oil PhospholipidsPhospholipids are lipid-protein complexes that bind together to form the cell membrane or â€œskinâ€ that surrounds every living cell in the body.Phospholipids are among the most plentiful of substances in our body.They are produced by the liver for the absorption of many nutrients from the food that we eat.Phospholipids enhance the absorption of fats and other nutrients in the body and help to reduce the load on the liver.It has a beneficial effect on cognitive function and liver health.Krill Oil DosageTherapeutic doses range from 1000-1500 mg krill oil (2- 3 capsules) per day with maintenance dosing of 500 mg daily (1 capsule)The recommended daily intakes are â€“ For cardiovascular benefits 1000mg â€“ 1500mg (2-3 capsules) â€“ It is reported as better to start with the higher intake and reduce this after about 2 months so long as the benefits can be maintained.Note: Doses may vary according to age and need.Krill Oil Vestige PriceVestige Krill OilÂ qualityÂ is very good.Â Compare to its health benefits its price is very less & reasonable. Description: DescriptionVestige Coenzyme Q10Coenzyme Q10 is an essential chemical that the body produces naturally. A deficiency of this chemical can have adverseÂ effects andÂ coenzymeÂ Q10 supplements may offer health benefits.Â Co-enzyme Q10 research has yielded a Nobel Prize in biochemistry in 1978 when the British scientist Peter Mitchell mapped out exactly how the nutrient works inside the cell.Â Â It is a powerful antioxidant that protects your cells from molecules that may cause damage. Your CoQ10 levels can drop due to age stress and cholesterol-lowering statin drug therapy and taking a CoQ10 supplement can help replenish your Coq10 back to optimal levels.Vestige Coenzyme Q10 benefits / Co-Enzyme Q 10 ke fayde / Co-Enzyme Q 10 UsesCoq10 might improve exercise tolerance in angina.Co-Enzyme Q 10 decreasing the risk of heart problems in people who have had a recent myocardial infarction.Co-Enzyme Q10 is good for blood vessel complications caused by coronary bypass surgery.Co-Enzyme Q 10 is good for Hypertension management Combining Coq10 with other antihypertensive agents may permit a decrease of antihypertensive dose as it can enhance the effects of antihypertensive medications.Taking Coq10 orally may lower systolic blood pressure by about 25% after 10-weeks of therapy in some people.The Role of Coq10 in Female Fertility:Â Â As women age their ability to get pregnant decreases because of poor egg formation and egg quality also drops with age.Â CoQ10 levels decline to start at age 21 and can drop with agingÂ women may need to supplement withÂ Coenzyme q10 support fertility.Â CoQ10 plays a vital role in the production of the energy required by egg cells and may support their normal functions.The Role of Coq10 in Male Fertility:Â Coq10 treatment can improve the movement and density of sperm in men with certain types of infertility.Â Stress sun exposure and smoking can cause your body to make molecules called reactive oxygen species (ROS). While the term ROS may be unfamiliar to you you have likely heard people talking about â€œfree radical damageâ€.Â Antioxidants can help protect your cells from ROS damage and taking antioxidants has been associated with increased sperm cell count and motility.Â Coq10 is a powerful antioxidant that can help neutralize excess ROS.Â Therefore Vestige Coenzyme q 10 may be necessary to support a healthy sex life.Improving the immune system of people with HIVÂ / AIDS: Coq10 is being used for strengthening the immune system of people with HIV / AIDS.Â Â Preventing migraine headaches (prophylaxis): Oral Vestige Coenzyme q10 capsules helps in preventing migraine headaches. It can decrease the frequency of headaches by about 36 %. However Coq10 does not seem to be effective in treating migraine once it has developed.Lower levels of Coq10 have been observed in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. Increasing Coq10 may increase the level of dopamine which is thought to be lower in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. It has also been suggested that CoQ10 might protect brain cells from damage by free radicals.Statins-induced myopathy Statins sometimes cause muscle pain. Oral CoQ10 might reduce this pain.It increases a healthy life span its lower dose of reducing oxidation and DNA double-strand breaks and a combination of a diet rich in polyunsaturated fatty acids and Vestige Coenzyme q10 supplementation leads to a longer life span in rats.Muscular dystrophy: Oral Co Enzyme q10 seems to improve physical performance in this inherited disorder.Cancer: Coq10 is being investigated as a treatment for cancer and as a relief from cancer treatment side-effect.Â Â Â CoQ10 plays a critical role in the protection of cell DNA and cell survival both of which are strongly linked to cancer prevention and recurrence.CoQ10 can reduce oxidative damage and inflammation that results in diseases of the lungs.CoQ10 has been shown to protect brain cells from oxidative damage and reduce the action of harmful compounds that can lead to brain disease.CoQ10 canÂ increase insulin sensitivity and improve blood sugar levels.When applied directly to the skin CoQ10 can reduce sun damage and increase antioxidant protection. A deficiency of this chemical can have adverseÂ effects andÂ coenzymeÂ Q10 supplements may offer health benefits.Â Co-enzyme Q10 research has yielded a Nobel Prize in biochemistry in 1978 when the British scientist Peter Mitchell mapped out exactly how the nutrient works inside the cell.Â Â It is a powerful antioxidant that protects your cells from molecules that may cause damage. Your CoQ10 levels can drop due to age stress and cholesterol-lowering statin drug therapy and taking a CoQ10 supplement can help replenish your Coq10 back to optimal levels.Vestige Coenzyme Q10 benefits / Co-Enzyme Q 10 ke fayde / Co-Enzyme Q 10 UsesCoq10 might improve exercise tolerance in angina.Co-Enzyme Q 10 decreasing the risk of heart problems in people who have had a recent myocardial infarction.Co-Enzyme Q10 is good for blood vessel complications caused by coronary bypass surgery.Co-Enzyme Q 10 is good for Hypertension management Combining Coq10 with other antihypertensive agents may permit a decrease of antihypertensive dose as it can enhance the effects of antihypertensive medications.Taking Coq10 orally may lower systolic blood pressure by about 25% after 10-weeks of therapy in some people.The Role of Coq10 in Female Fertility:Â Â As women age their ability to get pregnant decreases because of poor egg formation and egg quality also drops with age.Â CoQ10 levels decline to start at age 21 and can drop with agingÂ women may need to supplement withÂ Coenzyme q10 support fertility.Â CoQ10 plays a vital role in the production of the energy required by egg cells and may support their normal functions.The Role of Coq10 in Male Fertility:Â Coq10 treatment can improve the movement and density of sperm in men with certain types of infertility.Â Stress sun exposure and smoking can cause your body to make molecules called reactive oxygen species (ROS). While the term ROS may be unfamiliar to you you have likely heard people talking about â€œfree radical damageâ€.Â Antioxidants can help protect your cells from ROS damage and taking antioxidants has been associated with increased sperm cell count and motility.Â Coq10 is a powerful antioxidant that can help neutralize excess ROS.Â Therefore Vestige Coenzyme q 10 may be necessary to support a healthy sex life.Improving the immune system of people with HIVÂ / AIDS: Coq10 is being used for strengthening the immune system of people with HIV / AIDS.Â Â Preventing migraine headaches (prophylaxis): Oral Vestige Coenzyme q10 capsules helps in preventing migraine headaches. It can decrease the frequency of headaches by about 36 %. However Coq10 does not seem to be effective in treating migraine once it has developed.Lower levels of Coq10 have been observed in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. Increasing Coq10 may increase the level of dopamine which is thought to be lower in people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease. It has also been suggested that CoQ10 might protect brain cells from damage by free radicals.Statins-induced myopathy Statins sometimes cause muscle pain. Oral CoQ10 might reduce this pain.It increases a healthy life span its lower dose of reducing oxidation and DNA double-strand breaks and a combination of a diet rich in polyunsaturated fatty acids and Vestige Coenzyme q10 supplementation leads to a longer life span in rats.Muscular dystrophy: Oral Co Enzyme q10 seems to improve physical performance in this inherited disorder.Cancer: Coq10 is being investigated as a treatment for cancer and as a relief from cancer treatment side-effect.Â Â Â CoQ10 plays a critical role in the protection of cell DNA and cell survival both of which are strongly linked to cancer prevention and recurrence.CoQ10 can reduce oxidative damage and inflammation that results in diseases of the lungs.CoQ10 has been shown to protect brain cells from oxidative damage and reduce the action of harmful compounds that can lead to brain disease.CoQ10 canÂ increase insulin sensitivity and improve blood sugar levels.When applied directly to the skin CoQ10 can reduce sun damage and increase antioxidant protection. Co-Enzyme q 10 Supplement may also help decrease the risk of skin cancer.Co-Enzyme q10 foodsVegetarian Food contains Co-Enzyme Q 10Nuts and seeds:Â Sesame seeds and pistachios.Oils:Â Soybean and canola oil.Fruit:Â Oranges and strawberries.Vegetables:Â Spinach cauliflower and broccoli Mushroom.Legumes:Â Soybeans lentils and peanuts.Non-Vagitarian Food contains Co-Enzyme q10Some muscle meats:Â Pork beef and chickenFatty fish:Â Trout herring mackerel and sardineOrgan meats:Â Heart liver and kidneyCoQ10 properties make it helpful in the preservation of cells and the prevention and treatment of some chronic diseases.Â CoQ10 can be found as a Health supplement that seems to be well tolerated.Â Since CoQ10 production decreases with age adults of every age could benefit from more It usually affects older children.Vestige Protein Powder is low-fat soy and milk protein food supplement that provides the body with all the essential amino acids. It is especially beneficial for people involved in sports weight watchers and for general wellness. Name: Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth
Description: DescriptionVestige Kidney Health / Ayusante Kidney Health / Kidney Health Supplements/ Vestige Ayusante Kidneyhealth One in every 10 adults in India suffers from chronic kidney disease (CKD) and at any given point nearly five lakh patients are in need of life-long dialysis or transplant according to Sanjay K. Agarwal Professor and Head of Nephrology AIIMS.Kidney :The National Kidney Foundation of India estimates that 100 people in a million suffer from kidney ailments in India.The kidneys are bean-shaped organs that serve several essential regulatory roles.The kidneys are a pair of organs located in the back of the abdomen.Each kidney is about 4 or 5 inches long & about the size of a fist.There are two kidneys each about the size of a fist located on either side of the spine at the lowest level of the rib cage.Each kidney contains up to a million functioning units called nephrons.Importance of Kidney:Â The kidneys are powerful chemical factories that perform the followingÂ functions.Â Kidneys filter extra water and wastes out of your blood and produce urine.Remove waste products from the body.Balance the fluids in the body.Release the hormones that regulate blood pressure.Produce an active form of Vitamin D that promotes strong and healthy bones.Causes of Kidney Disease:Â Anyone can develop kidney disease regardless of their age. The main risk factors for developing kidney diseases are: Diabetes.High blood pressure.Cardiovascular (heart and blood vessel) disease.A family history of kidney failure or Renal Failure.Common Symptoms of Kidney Disease: Changes in urination â€”More or less urination than usual changes in the color of urine foamy or bubbly urineSwelling of the feet ankles hands or face â€” Fluid the kidneys canâ€™t remove stays in the tissues.Fatigue or weakness â€” due to the build-up of wastes.Shortness of breath â€”Because the excess fluid can build up in the lungs.Itching â€” waste build-up in the body can cause severe itching especially in the legs Loss of appetite.Nausea and vomiting.Common kidney problems include:Â

Name: Vestige Folic & Iron Plus Capsules
Description: DescriptionVestige Folic & Iron Plus CapsulesOne of the most common nutrient deficiencies found in women is that of iron and folic acid. Deficiency of both causes anaemia which results in a decreased number of red blood cells (RBCs) or low hemoglobin levels in the blood. The goal of providing iron-folic acid supplements is to restore normal levels of iron and to replenish hemoglobin levels in the blood. Poor dietary intake of iron accelerated increase in requirements of iron e.g. during pregnancy and lactation; adolescent females and elderly can benefit from the supplementation of iron and folic acid.Vestige Folic & Iron IngredientsEach capsule contains Ferrous Fumarate 250 mg Folic Acid 1 mg Vitamin C (coated) 75 mg Vitamin B12 15 mcg Zinc Sulphate Heptahydrate 100 mg equivalent to elemental zinc 22.7 mg.Vestige Iron & Folic Capsule Benefits /Vestige Iron & Folic Ke Fayde IRON: An important mineral that the body needs to produce red blood cells (RBCs) and in turn improves hemoglobin levels.FOLIC ACID: Needed to form healthy cells especially RBCs. Women of childbearing age should maintain adequate amounts of folic acid through supplements or diet to prevent birth defects.VITAMIN C: Improves the absorption of iron from the stomach.VITAMIN B12: Helps in maintaining the health of the nerve cells and for the synthesis of the RBCs.ZINC: May help prevent osteoporosis in women during menopause it also helps to strengthen the immune system.This combination plays an important role in overall growth and development.WOMENâ€™S HEALTHGet enough sleep which is usually about 7-8 hours.Plan your daily menu around fruits and vegetables whole grains and Lose weight sensibly with a balanced diet and regular exercise.Take time for personal intellectual or creative pursuits that you find.Be aware of your personal habits that increase your chances for illness get at least 30 minutes of heart-pumping exercise most days of the Work with your health care provider to get the check-ups and screenings right for your age and health issues.Watch out for depression; if emotions are keeping you down get help.Increase selfâ€”awareness about your body to notice changes that might warrant a call to your health care provider.Protect your skin from the Name: Vestige Folic & Iron Plus Capsules
Description: DescriptionVestige Folic & Iron Plus CapsulesOne of the most common nutrient deficiencies found in women is that of iron and folic acid. Deficiency of both causes anaemia which results in a decreased number of red blood cells (RBCs) or low hemoglobin levels in the blood. The goal of providing iron-folic acid supplements is to restore normal levels of iron and to replenish hemoglobin levels in the blood. Poor dietary intake of iron accelerated increase in requirements of iron e.g. during pregnancy and lactation; adolescent females and elderly can benefit from the supplementation of iron and folic acid.Vestige Folic & Iron IngredientsEach capsule contains Ferrous Fumarate 250 mg Folic Acid 1 mg Vitamin C (coated) 75 mg Vitamin B12 15 mcg Zinc Sulphate Heptahydrate 100 mg equivalent to elemental zinc 22.7 mg.Vestige Iron & Folic Capsule Benefits /Vestige Iron & Folic Ke Fayde IRON: An important mineral that the body needs to produce red blood cells (RBCs) and in turn improves hemoglobin levels.FOLIC ACID: Needed to form healthy cells especially RBCs. Women of childbearing age should maintain adequate amounts of folic acid through supplements or diet to prevent birth defects.VITAMIN C: Improves the absorption of iron from the stomach.VITAMIN B12: It is one of the most common infections after respiratory infections. It causes millions of women to suffer frequent painful urination and an urgent need to urinate. It is one of the most common types of infection that accounts for around 8.1 million visits to the doctor every year.UTIs are easily treated with prescribed antibiotics.But unfortunatelyÂ Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)Â has a tendency to recur.After an apparently cured first Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)Â about 20% of women will have another within 6 months.Â Among sexually active women with a history of 1 or moreÂ  Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) almost three-quarters will have another within a year.URINARY TRACT â€“ StructureÂ The urinary tract can be divided into the upper urinary tract and the lower urinary tract. But women have more than a 50% chance of getting a UTI in their lifetime than males In women the chances of getting a UTI is high because they have shorter urethras which allow bacteria quick access to the bladder.Â UTIs are one of the most frequent clinical bacterial infections in women accounting for nearly 25% of all infections & Untreated UTI can infect the kidneys and lead to many serious complications.Â There are approximately 150 million UTIs per year worldwide.Â Â Source: UTI: Disease panorama and challenges (2001) J. But women have more than a 50% chance of getting a UTI in their lifetime than males In women the chances of getting a UTI is high because they have shorter urethras which allow bacteria quick access to the bladder.Â UTIs are one of the most frequent clinical bacterial infections in women accounting for nearly 25% of all infections & Untreated UTI can infect the kidneys and lead to many serious complications.Â There are approximately 150 million UTIs per year worldwide.Â Â Source: UTI: Disease panorama and challenges (2001) J. Infect. Dis. germs.Dentassure Toothpaste Clove prevents cavities and supports gum health.Importance of Oral HealthOral health means more than just an attractive smile.Condition of the mouth mirrors the condition of the body as a whole.An unhealthy mouth especially gum disease may increase risk of serious health problems such as heart attack stroke poorly controlled diabetes and preterm labour.Research shows that most of the systemic diseases (diseases that involve many organs or the whole body) have oral symptoms too including swollen gums mouth ulcers dry mouth and excessive gum problems.Such diseases include:DiabetesOral cancerPancreatic cancerHeart diseaseKidney diseaseHealth Risks of Poor Oral HealthGum disease can lead to the loss of teeth and an increase the risk of respiratory disease.The bacteria in plaque can travel from the mouth to the lungs causing infection.Oral inflammation due to bacteria (gingivitis) may also play a role in clogged arteries and blood clots.Diabetic are more susceptible to gum disease and it can put them at greater risk of diabetic complications.Studies also show that pregnant women with poor oral health may be at a higher risk of delivering pre-term low birth weight babies.Digestion begins with physical and chemical processes in the mouth and oral problemsÂ can lead to intestinal failure irritable bowel syndrome and other digestive disorders.Common Oral ProblemsDental PlaqueGum Diseases â€“ Gingivitis and PeriodontitisTooth CavitiesTooth SensitivityTooth DecayWhen we eat and drink bacteria in plaque create acids.The acid removes minerals from the enamel which causes cavity.Decay begins in the main portion of the tooth the enamel and as it is broken down the decay goes deeper into the dentin and eventually reach the nerve (or pulp) of the tooth causing infection or tooth fracture.SymptomsThere may be no symptoms for cavities or tooth decay if they occur it includes:Tooth pain.Sensitive to sweet hot or cold foods and drinks.Visible pits or holes in the teeth.Pain when chewing.How to Avoid Dental Problems?Maintaining good oral hygiene is important to ensure a healthy mouth.Good oral health is important to overall well-being.Brush When fluoride reaches the teeth it gets absorbed into the enamel.It helps to repair the enamel by replenishing the lost calcium and phosphorous strengthening the teeth â€“ a process called Name: Vestige Enerva Hi-Nutrition Breakfast Cereal
Description: DescriptionHI-NUTRITION BREAKFAST CEREAL MAKE YOUR GOOD MORNINGS GREATâ€œYour breakfast must be like a mighty king your lunch must be like a beautiful queen and your dinner should be like a poor and weak soldierâ€Why Breakfast?Breakfast provides your body and brains the fuel after an overnight fast â€“ thatâ€™s where its name originates breaking the fast!Â Without breakfast you are effectively running on an empty stomach like trying to start the car without petrol in its tank.No breakfast means a sluggish start to the day.It also makes a person eat larger meals in the course of the day which ultimately converts to fat because the body goes into the starvation mode and starts to fill its reserves in the form of fatsHealthy Advice: (Nutritionists and Dieticians)The first meal of the day should be a perfect combination of carbohydrates protein & fiberBreakfast should be eaten within one hour of waking upA healthy breakfast should provide calories in the range of 20-35% of your recommended daily allowance (RDA)Hi-Nutrition Breakfast CerealHi Nutrition Breakfast Cereal is a healthy nutritious and convenient option for a busy lifestyle. It is packed with essential vitamins minerals protein fiber and energy to keep you active all day long.Hi-Nutrition Breakfast Cereal:Fiber: It creates bulk which aids in moving stool and harmful deposits through the digestive tract.Protein: It is a component of every cell in our body. In fact hair and nails are mostly made of protein our body uses it to build and repair tissue our need it to make enzymes hormones and other body chemicals.Iron: One of the main roles of iron is to help our red blood cells transport oxygen to all parts of the body.Â Fortification:  It is the practice of deliberately increasing the content of an essential micro-nutrient i.e. vitamins and minerals (including trace elements) in food so as to improve the nutritional quality of the food supply and provide a public health benefit with minimal risk to health (by WHO)Fortified with:Â Vitamin CVitamin B6Vitamin B12IronÂ Key IngredientsAMARANTH: A naturally gluten-free high nutrition grain that is rich in vitamins and minerals. It is also rich in essential amino acids. A great addition in your daily breakfast or snackMILLET: A nutrient-filled grain rich in fiber protein B vitamins and ironBLACK RAISINS: Rich in antioxidants and minerals good for the skin and teethPUMPKIN SEEDS: Rich in good fats antioxidants magnesium and zinc gives your health an added boostALMONDS: Excellent source of Vitamin E and minerals great for the skin heart and brain.Benefits of Hi-Nutrition Breakfast CerealOffers a great tasteGives a sense of fullnessProvides macro-nutrients like Protein Carbohydrates and FibreAlso supplies micro-nutrients like vitamins and mineralsRecipes using ENERVA â€“ Hi-Nutrition Breakfast CerealCEREAL PUDDINGTake a glass of milkAdd 1 bowl of ENERVA- Hi Nutrition Breakfast CerealAdd chopped fruits and crushed nuts for garnishingYOGURT PARFRAITPour 2 tablespoon of the sweetened curd in each serving glassAdd some fruits over the curdTop with the ENERVA- Hi-Nutrition Breakfast CerealServe immediatelyTips: The fruits can be scooped into small balls or cut into different shapes using cookie cutters.MULTIGRAIN BALLSHeat a non-stick pan add the ENERVA Hi-Nutrition Breakfast Cereal brown sugar jaggery/honey mix well and cook on medium flame for 2 minutesRemove from the flame and allow it to cool slightlyDivide the mixture into equal portions and roll the portion into small ballsStore it in an air-tight container and consume whenever you want

Description: DescriptionVestige Sharp Water Purifier â€“ For the first time in the country Vestige Marketing Pvt. Ltd has created all its products on CNT (Cellular Nourishment Therapy) for the body to be completely healthy with its main components â€“ complete diet clean air and clean water.Types of filters in the Sharp Water Purifier :There were health supplement and air purifier in that series and now company has brought the countryâ€™s best water purifier.1) P.P. Filter â€“ Cleans dirt soil. Big P.P. filter helps to clean more.2) Carbon Filter â€“ Made of small particles of carbon which helps to clean muscular dirt. 3) RO Membrane â€“ Sharp Water Purifier has US RO Membrane which has a life span of 2 years and also cleans toxic substances such as 93.3 arsenic.4) AFD Disruptor â€“ This technique is not yet available in any other water purifier and it makes water 99.9% clean. Other water purifiers give a lot of emphasis on the UV to clean up biological mess. But with the UV technology organic matter such as germs and bacteria either become inactive for some time or die. They still stay in drinking water. If they are inactive then there is a considerable point that after drinking water those bacteria become active.On the contrary the Sharp Water Purifierâ€™s AFD Disruptor Technology absorbs these organic dirt by itself & gives you the cleanest drinking water.There is also a display in the Sharp Water Purifier through which you may know when and which filter you will have to change. If you think that you do not want to change the filter right now you can also reset the display. In addition all plastic components are made of 100% food grade plastic.On the Sharp Water Purifier you get world-class testing certificates with the guarantee that the most clean drinking water is available in your glass.On the Sharp Water Purifier you get one year warranty and out of 19000 zip codes across the country you will get full service at 13500 pin code locations from the company.#VestigeSharpWaterPurifier #Vestproduct #Vestige #Sharp #WaterPurifier Net Contents : 1 pieceSharp Vestige Water Purifier FAQsHow is Water used by our body?The human body contains 55 to 78% of Water depending on the body structure. The body requires to be fed with a suitable amount of water to avoid dehydration. The precise amount depends on the activities ambient temperature and humidity. Water is not the only source to manage the bodyâ€™s fluid content. Fruits food and some beverages also provide fluids to our body that help in hydration. The critical point is humans require drinking water with fewer impurities which can then be absorbed in the systemic circulation. The journey of Water (mouth tongue to esophagus towards the stomach and finally excretion) â€“ this is where the importance of maintaining normal pH is explained. For example Acid is vital to help in eliminating the bacteria or other pathogens in the stomach. The acidic environment helps in the digestion of food. The enzyme Pepsin which helps to breakdown proteins in the stomach can only function optimally in the low pH environment.Preliminary Introduction on Sharp Water Purifier WJ-400This Water Purifier is designed for complete installation flexibility keeping urban households in mind. The three major components are the Main Unit Water Storage Tank and Water Tap. The Main Unit can be installed at the Wall Under Sink or even kept on the kitchen work area. The Water Storage Tank is recommended to be placed under the sink only while the Water tap may be connected on the basin or even hanged on the wall. This kind of flexibility ensures total utilization of space in your kitchen area. The unique Filtration system and quality of filters make sure that we get consistent and superior quality of drinking water for the entire life of the filters. The life of filters and quality of Water may vary depending on input water conditions.Additional Special Note: Our Water Purifier provides the purest water to ensure that it is BIOAVAILABLE while maintaining the pH similar to the input. What is TDS?TDS or Total Dissolved Solids is measured in mg/Liter of Water which is the most soluble substance in our universe a variety of metals or other impurities get easily dissolved.Types of salts and minerals that constitute the TDSThe useful ones are Magnesium Sodium Potassium Phosphorous and CalciumThe harmful ones are high-level bicarbonates of calcium iron and sodium. Other soluble impurities include nitrate arsenic chlorides sulfates. It also contains suspended impurities like mud sand or other organic matter. Which devices can measure TDS? How much do they cost? Are they reliable and accurate?TDS measuring devices are readily available on various online e-commerce portals. The good ones cost between Rs 200 to 250. These readings may not be entirely accurate as the right way to measure TDS in a laboratory is to evaporate the water leaving behind the dissolved solutes as residue and then weighing it. However these TDS Meters give a fair idea and thus making sure you can drink the right quality of water while using the right technology. How can we determine the constituents of the TDS in our water supply?With the portable devices available we can measure the weight of soluble impurities in the Water. However unfortunately it can measure both helpful and harmful ones and it can also not be known at what ratio they are. So lower the TDS better is the Water for drinking. Up to what TDS of Water is suitable for drinking?As per WHO Water where TDS is up to 300mg/L is drinkable. However as per Indian Standard No IS 3025 (part 16)- 1984-RA:2012 water with TDS up to 500mg/L is drinkable. What can be done to replenish the useful minerals which are filtered out?Water is not the only source of fluids required by the body nor itâ€™s the only source of minerals. Most fruits vegetables Grains Supplements can also help replenish the lost minerals. What are the sources of drinking water? Which are the common impurities found in source water?There are primarily two sources of drinking water â€“ underground bore-well or municipal supply. In the case of Municipal supply the TDS is generally within 300 to 500 but there is high usage of Chlorine. Moreover when this Water travels through Corporation pipeline it adds enormous amounts of unwanted and carcinogenic substances which may not increase the TDS levels drastically but deteriorates the quality of Water. On the other hand underground bore-well water contains high amounts of turbidity and chemical impurities making it unsuitable for drinking. Thus depending on the condition of source water Purification System may be recommended. Is Water with TDS of lesser than 50mg/L suitable for drinking?TDS measured by these instruments consider helpful minerals (calcium potassium or magnesium) as well as carcinogenic substances and heavy metals (lead mercury arsenic or fluoride). Considering the current condition of source water the ratio may vary depending on location season etc. There are no instruments which can separately measure helpful minerals and unwanted impurities. Hence lower the TDS lesser are the chances of contaminants in drinking water. TDS of less than 50mg/L will not have sufficient minerals is it suitable for drinking?TDS measures both helpful minerals and unwanted impurities in Water. There are no instruments which can separately measure them. Hence we will never come to know the actual ratio between useful minerals and unwanted contaminants. Considering the quality of source water it is evident that higher TDS will have a probability of more impurities. We drink about 3 to 4 liters of water a day; Water is NOT the only source of minerals required by our body.It is advised and wise to eliminate both minerals and impurities from drinking water thus removing the threats of waterborne diseases like Typhoid & Diarrhea completely. While knowing the fact that fruits and vegetables available today contain pesticides still they provide a sufficient amount of such helpful minerals required by the body. Even if they are not fulfilled one can take necessary supplements thus not allowing unwanted substances to enter our body through drinking water by any means. Is it OK to drink Water with TDS less than 50mg/L?Why not? Lesser the TDS purer is the Water. Purer Water has a higher ability to be absorbed in our systemic circulation thus enabling our body to fulfill benefits from drinking water. Up to what TDS of Water is the Vestige Sharp Water Purifier suitable for?We have tested our product model number WJ-400 for TDS of 1547mg/L at TUV Lab (Certificate available on demand). What is suggested in case of a higher TDS?In case of higher TDS and turbidity we recommend additional Pre Filter which can protect the PP (Polypropylene) Filter and RO Membrane from premature failures as none of the Filters are covered under Warranty. The Pre Filter comes in a casing and is connected before the inlet pipe of Water Purifier. Apart from protecting the PP Filter it will also help enhance the performance and life of other Filters (especially RO & CB). The initial cost of Pre Filter is between Rs 700 to 800 (with casing) and the replacement cost is Rs 200. The frequency of replacement is 3 to 6 months depending on the turbidity and the constituents of the source water. PP (Polypropylene) Filter has choked/ blocked before itâ€™s recommended life! What is the reason? What can be done to prevent this?This is primarily due to the high presence of impurities and turbidity in the source water. Our water purifier ensures that we consistently drink purer quality of Water and hence the pollutants are accumulated in the first set of Filter and never allowed to pass towards the RO Membrane thus ensuring that we get the purest Water for the entire life of all the filters. In case the turbidity is high in your area we recommend the use of Additional Pre Filter. Please refer to the answer to â€œWhat is suggested in case of higher TDS?â€ for more details. How is our PP filter better than Sediment Filter?Sediment Filter uses a sponge-like material. With the pressure of Water and attack from physical impurities like metals or sand the gaps may get enlarged thus leaking the bigger size of particles (more than 5 microns) towards the RO membrane. Eventually the pore size of the RO membrane also gets affected with the continuous blow thus passing on impurities to the drinking water tap. There is no system to block or stop contaminations in Sediment Filters. Since we are drinking this Water regularly we donâ€™t make out the difference or deterioration in quality. PP or Polypropylene Filter used by Sharp is of a superior quality material that never passes the impurities over 5 microns towards the RO Membrane thus ensuring consistency in output water all through the life of Filters. What is the capacity of our RO Membrane?It is of 50GPD. It means that it can produce up to 8 to 9 liters of water per hour. How is the SHARP Water Purifier RO Membrane better? What is the rated life?Sharp Water Purifier WJ-400 uses RO Membrane from DOW USA which is known to be one of the most premium quality membranes and has an extended life with superior efficiency. The rated life is two years. However it may vary depending on the condition of the source water. What is AF Disruptor Technology? Is it better than UV or UF Technology?AF Disruptor Technology from AHLSTROM used in Sharp Water Purifier employs an ALUMINA FIBRE layer (not made of aluminum). When the water passes through the particular layer it generates a 51mv ZETA Potential that enables the impurities in the water to be separated from running Water. It does not work on the principal of pore size but deflective or disruptive method where the water pressure is retained. AF Disruptor Technology does not require any electricity to operate. UF or Ultra Filtration is based on pore size and is claimed to be effective in reducing particles of up to 0.1 microns with an average efficiency of ~75%. Hence a large number of biological and chemical impurities pass untreated. For the same a UV a light source is deployed in a special casing to generate Ozone when it comes in contact with Water. Ozone can eliminate some pathogens from Water. However in this case stay-time/time the Water remains in connection with the UV is essential and if the water passes through the chamber faster the half- dead pathogens or the dead ones (endotoxins) remain in Water which may cause harm. Moreover since Service Technicians never clean the UV Chamber it thus reduces the effectiveness over time. What is the life of AF Disruptor and how shall we know when to replace?The rated life of AF Disruptor Filter is 12 months. However it may be used for a more extended period if the taste of Water is unchanged and replaced earlier if there is any change in the flavor over time. Since the taste of Water is relative and if you donâ€™t want to take a chance please replace once in every 12 months. What is the capacity of the Storage Water Tank and how much time does it take to fill it?The Storage Tank capacity of Water Purifier WJ-400 is up to 5.3 liters. It takes approximately 35 to 40 minutes to fill the tank. How much water is produced in one hour?If the Water Purifier is running continuously it can produce up to 8 to 9 liters of water per hour. However it may vary depending on running usage and storage. What is the Warranty period of Water Purifier and what all is covered under Warranty?Our products come with one year warranty from the date of Installation. All electrical and mechanical parts are covered under Warranty except plastic parts and Filters. How do we avail Installation or Warranty Service?In case of Installation Breakdown or any Preventive Service request please use any of the below options:Dial Toll-Free Number 18004254322 between 7 AM and 9 PM on all daysGive a Missed Call at 8750922277 and you will receive a callbackSend email to [emailÂ protected]Please use a Mobile Number which response to our representative who will call within 2 to 3 hours. In case it remains unanswered in three attempts our Service Team will cancel the call and send you a message. You will then have to call again to register the request. Never call the Technician for logging complaints unless the call is recorded the service request shall not be entertained. What if my complaint is not attended within 48 hours? What is the escalation process?Except for remote locations all calls are expected to be attended within 24 to 48 hours in case of delay or to report any other serious complaints; please email to [emailÂ protected] What is most unique about the Sharp Vestige Water Purifier? What are the key benefits?In the case of most Water Purifiers available in the market output water is stored in Tank after it passes through all the purification stages. While it is evident that most Water Purifiers claim an efficiency of 95 to 99% the remaining impurities accumulate in the Storage Tank. In the absence of regular cleaning it results in the formation of algae and other biological contaminants. So the output drinking water doesnâ€™t match with the claims made by some of the very reputed brands. In the case of Sharp the Water is passed through AF Disruptor medium before it is delivered through the tap thus ensuring purest drinking water is served at all the times. This can be verified through TUV Test Report Number GGN/F(C/M)/19/003790 which confirms the absolute purity of the output water purifier. Please refer to the chart above.The other benefits include:Flexible Usage and Installation environments: May be installed in Kitchen or any different location with water input conveniences. Suitable for Under the Sink Wall Mount or above the counter.Sharp Original Design and superior build quality: Built with high-grade raw materials wherever purified Water makes contact.Electrical safety & Performance efficiency certificates: TUV RoHS FDA NSDS & SGS verification ensures security and health. What is the meaning of the â€œFilter Changeâ€ Indicator and how to know the replacement period?The Water Purifier Digital Panel displays the indicator for all Filter sets starting with PP CB RO & AF. The Indicator or charge level whichever you may call it depends on the hour of usage and not according to the water quality. Till such time the PP filter does not block the water it may be used. In case the level indicator comes to â€˜NILâ€™ and the PP Filter is not blocked you may RESET it and continue using it. However even if the level has not reached â€˜NILâ€™ and the PP filter is Blocked please replace it. Also read point number 8 & 9 for more details. RESET function is not recommended for CB RO & AF Disruptor; however if the taste and quality are satisfactory you may RESET and reuse only the AF Disruptor. RO Membrane Technology produces drain or wastewater can it be reused?Our RO produces about 65 to 70% of Water which contains impurities (removed from the input water). We request all our valued users to be conscious about the natural resources and the environment thus storing the drained Water in a bucket/ container and use it for mopping floors watering plants and washing utensils. What are the points to keep in mind before Installation?Our Water Purifier WJ-400 is in three parts â€“ Main Unit Storage Water Tank and Water Tap. The Main Unit can be mounted on the wall placed on the kitchen top or installed under the sink. You need a 2â€² x 2â€² space to place the Main Unit. The dimensions are also mentioned in the water purifier outer packing. Please decide on the location once you purchase the Water Purifier. The Storage Tank is recommended to be placed under the sink and the water tap may be fixed either on the sink or wall. In case someone wants to fix the Water Tap in the Kitchen Granite a 25mm hole is to be prepared through an external vendor. Do we need to pay any Installation Charges?Sharp Service Team will do not charge for the installation of the Sharp Vestige Water Purifier WJ-400. Extra charges are only applicable if you purchase additional Pre-Filter based on Technician recommendations (please read point number 11 for more details) No extra charges payable for plumbing and drillings. If the Technician is demanding extra charges please call our Toll Free Number 18004254322 immediately and report the problem. Our Service Support Team will take action accordingly.

These ions go out into the air & surface and seek out and inactivate unwanted airborne pollutants Net contents:Â  1 piece

Name: Vestige Agri
Description: DescriptionVestige AgriVestige offers a range of products for sustainable increase in crop yield and its quality. These include crop nutrition crop disease prevention and management activators and spreaders bio-fertilizers and crop bio-stimulants. Vestige Agri products are based on modern biotechnology and help to increase yield through better root-shoot development soilâ€™s health soil conditioning resistance capability against plant diseases and better crop nutrition.AGRI-HUMIC is a concentrate of Humic substances. It is a plant biostimulant containing 6% humic substances derived from freshly processed renewable Agri Biomass. This product helps the crops to manage osmotic stress. These active forms of humic substances like humic acid fulvic acid and activated Phytohormones (plant growth substances) promote cell division or cytokinesis in plant roots and shoots. This product accelerates plant metabolic processes and enhances nutrient uptake thereby utilising the nutrient in a better way which in turn helps in better yield growth and development of plants. This product increases soil capacity to retain nutrients and water. It also encourages development of beneficial microorganisms in the soil. AGRI-HUMIC also helps plants to withstand extreme weather conditions. [Net Content: 500 ml]AGRI-MOSS is a product of natural origin for the complete nutrition of plants. It is water soluble and non-toxic to plants animals and human beings.Â  It enhances crop performance growth vigour yield and quality. It is very useful in plantâ€™s fertility and reproduction process. [Net Content: 500 ml]AGRI- GOLD is a plant growth regulator that can infiltrate into the plant rapidly and delivers magical results. It helps to promote the cytoplasm circulation inside the plant cell. It is a unique combination of bio-ingredients that helps the crop to increase its metabolic activities and enhances their growth. [Net Content: 100 g]AGRI-BIOFUNGICIDE is a unique formulation of systematic and organic fungicide. It multiplies fast on root exudates produces antibiotics and enzymes that kill the pathogens in the rhizosphere and protects the host plant. It is harmless to the environment and does not create resistance in the crops. [Net Content: 500 g]AGRI-NANOTEK is a highly innovative product which is developed using nanotechnology. It helps to improve soil-fertility by releasing ï¬xed nutrients and minerals in the soil. It enhances soil fertility plant growth increases nutrient usage and helps in the photosynthesis process.
